translations.translation: and then went off to his family, swaggering.
Then he strutted back to his people.
then he went back to his kinsfolk, elated with pride.
and haughtily goes to his people.
Then he went back to his home in pride.
Then he walked in conceit to his family admiring himself!
Then he went to his followers, walking away in haughtiness.
then he went to his household arrogantly.
Then went he to his folk with glee.
Then he went off to his people, swaggering.
Then he departed Unto his house hold conceitedly.
and went back swaggering to his family.
Then did he stalk to his family in full conceit!
Then he walked in full pride to his family admiring himself!
then went arrogantly to his household.
Then he went to his family, full of pride.
And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride].
[75:33]   then went off to his family swaggering, strutting about in self-conceit.
(Then went he to his folk) in the life of the world (with glee) strutting and behaving wantonly.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّىٰ } معناه يَتَبخترُ

translations.translation: And His saying, "Then he went to his people, walking" [Qur'an 12:29] means that he was walking quickly.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ ثُمَّ } بعد انصرافه وإعراضه عن المرشد الدَّاعي { ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّىٰ } [القيامة: 33] يتبختر فرحاناً مسروراً
 مباهياً بفعلته
 مفتخراً بشأنه


قيل له حينئذٍ من قِبَل الحق مخاطباً إياه بالويل والهلاك
